section.docs:
Accounts are like houses. All resources in live in a house. The account is the house. You only have access to things inside your account. Accounts are for groups of users. They intended for Companies, IE, your company would open an account in Radium then add users to it. Usage Based Billing services are billed to the account. The account contains billing and credit.
You are only allowed to manage your own account. You are not allowed to create or delete existing accounts. That process is handled by the server.

section.title: Account Format
section.docs:
### Changable Attributes
name
Required
public
Determines the default setting for handling following requests. All followable records will use the value for their default which can be changed later.
Example: If this is true, then all contacts will have their following requests automatically approved UNLESS switched off specifically for that contact.
Default: True
avatar
See avatar section
### Read Only Attributes
users
IDs of all the users in this account
contacts
IDs of all the contacts in this account
campaigns
IDs of all the campaigns in this account
